description: Third year Mechanical Engineering major at Ga Tech from Chattanooga, TN. Proud to be part of the Spring 13' class BK 1944! I have a passion for traveling the world and paintball. I am thankful to be playing in the pro division of the largest national paintball tournament series in the world. I Love Lambda Chi and all my bros.
aspects: THE BROS, game days, semi-formal/formal, Thursday nights, whiskey buckets, mixers and date nights, the penthouse, Magic Carpet Ride, ....I could go on forever, but it means  a lot to be surrounded by bros with similar goals and aspirations in life. From the old guys to the young guns, everyone is always there for you.
involve: Ga Tech Paintball Team player and coach
quotes: "All men dream: but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their minds wake in the day to find that it was vanity. But the dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act their dreams with open eyes, to make it possible." -T.E. Lawrence
"It's never too late to start beefing up your obituary." -Unknown
name: Michael Zuppa
